name: importSiteDevices
description:
Import Information for Multiple Devices

CSV format:
```csv
mac,name,map_id,x,y,height,orientation,labels,band_24.power,band_24.bandwidth,band_24.channel,band_24.disabled,band_5.power,band_5.bandwidth,band_5.channel,band_5.disabled,band_6.power,band_6.bandwidth,band_6.channel,band_6.disabled
5c5b53010101,"AP 1",845a23bf-bed9-e43c-4c86-6fa474be7ae5,30,10,2.3,45,"guest, campus, vip",1,20,0,false,0,40,0,false,17,80,0,false
```

locked.description: whether this map is considered locked down

map_id.description: map where the device belongs to

orientation.description: orientation, 0-359, in degrees, up is 0, right is 90.

poe_passthrough.description: whether to enable power out through module port (for APH) or eth1 (for APL/BT11)

port_config.description:
eth0 is allowed in mesh relay mode, otherwise eth0 is not allowed here. 
The property key is the interface(s) name (e.g. "eth1" or"eth1,eth2")

base.description: additional power to request during negotiating with PSE over PoE, in mW

prefer_usb_over_wifi.description: whether to enable power out to peripheral, meanwhile will reduce power to wifi (only for AP45 at power mode)

dot1x.description: Whether to do 802.1x against uplink switch. When enaled, AP cert will be used to do EAP-TLS and the Org's CA Cert has to be provisioned at the switch

vars.description: a dictionary of name->value, the vars can then be used in Wlans. This can overwrite those from Site Vars

host.description: required if enabled, aeroscout server host

locate_connected.description: whether to enable the feature to allow wireless clients data received and sent to AES server for location calculation

beam_disabled.description: list of AP BLE location beam numbers (1-8) which should be disabled at the AP and not transmit location information (where beam 1 is oriented at the top the AP, growing counter-clock-wise, with 9 being the omni BLE beam)

eddystone_uid_adv_power.description: advertised TX Power, -100 to 20 (dBm), omit this attribute to use default

eddystone_uid_enabled.description: only if `beacon_enabled`==`false`, Whether Eddystone-UID beacon is enabled

eddystone_uid_freq_msec.description: Frequency (msec) of data emmit by Eddystone-UID beacon

eddystone_url_adv_power.description: advertised TX Power, -100 to 20 (dBm), omit this attribute to use default

eddystone_url_enabled.description: only if `beacon_enabled`==`false`, Whether Eddystone-URL beacon is enabled

eddystone_url_freq_msec.description: Frequency (msec) of data emmit by Eddystone-UID beacon

ibeacon_adv_power.description: advertised TX Power, -100 to 20 (dBm), omit this attribute to use default

ibeacon_enabled.description: can be enabled if `beacon_enabled`==`true`, whether to send iBeacon

ibeacon_freq_msec.description: Frequency (msec) of data emmit for iBeacon

ibeacon_uuid.description: optional, if not specified, the same UUID as the beacon will be used

enabled.description:
when acted as client bridge:
* only 5G radio can be used
* will not serve as AP on any radios

output.description: whether the pin is configured as an output. DO and A1-A4 can be repurposed by changing

pullup.description: the type of pull-up the pin uses (internal, external, none), default none
the type of pull-up the pin uses (internal, external, none), default none

enabled.description: whether mesh is enabled on this AP

group.description: mesh group, base AP(s) will only allow remote AP(s) in the same mesh group to join, 1-9, optional

additional_vlan_ids.description: additional VLAN IDs, only valid in mesh base mode

mxtunnel_name.description: if `forwarding`==`site_mxedge`, vlan_ids comes from site_mxedge (`mxtunnels` under site setting)

vlan_id.description:
optional to specify the vlan id for a tunnel if forwarding is for `wxtunnel`, `mxtunnel` or `site_mxedge`.
* if vlan_id is not specified then it will use first one in vlan_ids[] of the mxtunnel.
* if forwarding == site_mxedge, vlan_ids comes from site_mxedge (`mxtunnels` under site setting)

wxtunnel_id.description: if `forwarding`==`wxtunnel`, the port is bridged to the vlan of the session

wxtunnel_remote_id.description: if `forwarding`==`wxtunnel`, the port is bridged to the vlan of the session

acct_interim_interval.description: how frequently should interim accounting be reported, 60-65535. default is 0 (use one specified in Access-Accept request from RADIUS Server). Very frequent messages can affect the performance of the radius server, 600 and up is recommended when enabled

network.description:
use `network`or `source_ip`
which network the RADIUS server resides, if there's static IP for this network, we'd use it as source-ip

mxcluster_ids.description:
To use Org mxedges when this WLAN does not use mxtunnel, specify their mxcluster_ids.
Org mxedge(s) identified by mxcluster_ids

server_name.description: name of the server to verify (against the cacerts in Org Setting). Only if not Mist Edge.

servers.description: List of Radsec Servers. Only if not Mist Edge.

use_site_mxedge.description: To use Site mxedges when this WLAN does not use mxtunnel

ant_gain_24.description: antenna gain for 2.4G - for models with external antenna only

ant_gain_5.description: antenna gain for 5G - for models with external antenna only

ant_gain_6.description: antenna gain for 6G - for models with external antenna only

band_24_usage.description: if `band_24_usage`==`5`, by default, band_5 properties is used, if specific channel/bandwidth/power/... is desired, use the "band_5_on_24_radio"

bandwidth.description: channel width for the band, 20 / 40 / 80 / 160, 80 is only applicable for band_5 and 160 is only for band_6, ignored if channel is 0

channel.description: For Device. (primary) channel for the band, 0 means using the Site Setting

channels.description: For RFTemplates. List of channels, null or empty array means auto

power.description: TX power of the radio. For Devices, 0 mean using the Site Setting

power_max.description: when power=0, max tx power to use, HW-specific values will be used if not set

power_min.description: when power=0, min tx power to use, HW-specific values will be used if not set

channel.description:
only if `type`==`imagotag`
channel selection, not needed by default, required for manual channel override only

enabled.description: whether to enable any usb config

imagotag_type.description:
only if `type`==`imagotag`
if native imagotag is enabled, BLE will be disabled automatically

verify_cert.description: only if `type`==`imagotag`, whether to turn on SSL verification
